summary: Ten easy steps show you how to make money from drugs, featuring a series of interviews with drug dealers, prison employees, and lobbyists arguing for tougher drug laws.
cast: Woody Harrelson|Susan Sarandon|50 Cent|Eminem|David Simon|Russell Simmons|Arianna Huffington|Matthew Cooke|'Freeway' Ricky Ross|Bobby Carlton|Pepe|Yolanda Madden|Brian O'Dea|Eric Sterling|Mike Walzman|Howard Wooldridge|Barry Neal Cooper|Raymond Madden|Skipp Townsend|Radley Balko|Alexandra Natapoff|Jim Gray|Joe Gilbride|Mr. X|John E. Harriel Jr.|Neil Franklin|Keith Crossan|Patrick Reynalds|R. Gil Kerlikowske
title: How to Make Money Selling Drugs
